languages.text: {n}Абеляр откашливается.{/n} "Перед тобой — Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус, несмышленая чернь! Живо взял себя в руки и ответил по форме!"
{n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр откашливается.{/n} "Перед тобой — Вольный Торговец фон Валанциус, несмышленая чернь! Живо взял себя в руки и ответил по форме!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Straighten yourself out this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich.{/n} "Ihr steht vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius, unwissender Wurm! Steht sofort gerade und erstattet {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} anständig Bericht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard räuspert sich.{/n} "Ihr steht vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von Valancius, unwissender Wurm! Steht sofort gerade und erstattet {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} anständig Bericht!"

languages.text: {n}Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Vous vous tenez devant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius, misérable vermine ignorante ! Reprenez-vous et faites immédiatement un rapport en bonne et due forme à Sa Seigneurie ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Vous vous tenez devant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius, misérable vermine ignorante ! Redressez-vous et faites immédiatement un rapport en bonne et due forme à Sa Seigneurie ! »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子。{/n}“你这无知的蛆虫！你面前这位大人是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人！马上给我挺直身子，对这位大人进行正式报告！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德清了清嗓子。{/n}“你这无知的蛆虫！你面前这位大人是冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人！马上给我挺直身子，对这位大人进行正式报告！”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いをする。{/n}「無知なるウジ虫ども、フォン・ヴァランシウスの自由開拓者の御前である！今すぐに身を引き締め、陛下に正式なご報告をせよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは咳払いをする。{/n}「無知なるウジ虫ども、フォン・ヴァランシウスの自由開拓者の御前である！すぐに身を引き締め、陛下に正式なご報告をせよ！」

languages.text: {n}Abelard carraspea.{/n} «¡Está usted ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, sabandija ignorante! ¡Póngase firme de inmediato e informe a {mf|milord|milady} como es debido!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard carraspea.{/n} «¡Está usted ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius, sabandija ignorante! ¡Póngase firme de inmediato e informe a {mf|milord|milady} como es debido!».

languages.text: {n}Abelard boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir von Valancius'un karşısındasın zırcahil herif! Hemen hazır ola geç ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne adam gibi rapor ver!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard clears his throat.{/n} "You stand before Rogue Trader von Valancius, you ignorant worm! Snap to attention this instant and give {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} a formal report!"
